title: G.O.P. Senator’s Report on Covid Origins Suggests Lab Leak, but Offers Little New Evidence
description: The report, signed by Senator Richard Burr, foreshadows a new wave of political wrangling over Covid’s origins if Republicans gain control of the House or Senate.
dc:creator: Benjamin Mueller and Carl Zimmer
media:description: Security personnel outside the Wuhan Institute of Virology during a visit by the W.H.O. to investigate the origins of the coronavirus, in Wuhan, China, in February 2021.
